verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARGM-LOC: In a dramatic diplomatic turn] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: called] off [ARG1: next month 's summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: calling the cancellation a " tremendous setback] "

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — In a dramatic diplomatic turn , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Thursday called off next month 's summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , [V: calling] [ARG1: the cancellation] [ARG2: a " tremendous setback] "
